pullrequest.title: Fix deleting and saving light on server

content.raw:
I think this is a separate issue:

1. `gazebo`

1. Insert a point light

1. Save the world via the GUI

1. `gazebo your_saved_world.world`

1. The point light is not rendered until it is selected or another object is inserted into the world
content.html:
I think this is a separate issue:

  1. gazebo

  2. Insert a point light

  3. Save the world via the GUI

  4. gazebo your_saved_world.world

  5. The point light is not rendered until it is selected or another object is inserted into the world
